## Description {#details}

This class is used to track local variable information.

Variables that have been optimized out hold the <code>monostate</code> alternative. This is not distinguished from the case of a constructed <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgvariable">DbgVariable</a></code> which has not be initialized yet.

Variables can be created from allocas, in which case they&#39;re generated from the MMI table. Such variables hold the <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loc/mmi">Loc::MMI</a></code> alternative which can have multiple expressions and frame indices.

Variables can be created from the entry value of registers, in which case they&#39;re generated from the MMI table. Such variables hold the <code>EntryValueLoc</code> alternative which can either have a single expression or multiple <em>fragment</em> expressions.

Variables can be created from <code>DBG&#95;VALUE</code> instructions. Those whose location changes over time hold a <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loc/multi">Loc::Multi</a></code> alternative which uses <code>DebugLocListIndex</code> and (optionally) <code>DebugLocListTagOffset</code>, while those with a single location hold a <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loc/single">Loc::Single</a></code> alternative which use <code>ValueLoc</code> and (optionally) a single <code>Expr</code>.

Definition at line 214 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfdebug-h">DwarfDebug.h</a>.
